location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J West, Deputy Accountant General, Office of Audit, Public Department, Bombay, to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing an audit of the Resident's account for May 1816 and informing him that his disbursements from May 1816 to January 1817 have been approved.The audit is not enclosed with the letter.The signature of the author is difficult to read and has been given as J West.
